job_details.Functieomschrijving:
At Databricks, our core values are at the heart of everything we do; creating a culture of proactiveness and a customer-centric mindset guides us to create a unified platform that makes data science and analytics accessible to everyone. We aim to inspire our customers to make informed decisions that push their business forward. We provide a user-friendly and intuitive platform that makes it easy to turn insights into action and fosters a culture of creativity, experimentation, and continuous improvement. You will be an essential part of this mission, using your technical expertise to demonstrate how our Databricks Data Intelligence Platform can help customers solve their complex data challenges. You'll work with a collaborative, customer-focused team that values innovation and creativity, using your skills to create customized solutions to help our customers achieve their goals and guide their businesses forward. Join us in our quest to change how people work with data and make a
   better world!

   Reporting to Senior Manager, Field Engineering.

   The impact you will have:
     * Form successful relationships with clients throughout your assigned territory, working with an account executive to provide technical and business value.
     * Gain excitement from clients about Databricks through hands-on evaluation and Spark programming, integrating with the wider cloud ecosystem and 3rd party applications.
     * Contribute to building the Databricks technical through engagement at workshops, seminars, and meet-ups.
     * Become a Big Data Analytics advisor on aspects of architecture and design.
     * Support your customers by authoring reference architectures, how-tos, and demo applications.
     * Develop both technically and in the pre-sales aspect with the goal of becoming an independently operating Solutions Engineer.
job_details.full_text:
Sr. Solutions Engineer

At Databricks, our core values are at the heart of everything we do; creating a culture of proactiveness and a customer-centric mindset guides us to create a unified platform that makes data science and analytics accessible to everyone. We aim to inspire our customers to make informed decisions that push their business forward. We provide a user-friendly and intuitive platform that makes it easy to turn insights into action and fosters a culture of creativity, experimentation, and continuous improvement. You will be an essential part of this mission, using your technical expertise to demonstrate how our Databricks Data Intelligence Platform can help customers solve their complex data challenges. You'll work with a collaborative, customer-focused team that values innovation and creativity, using your skills to create customized solutions to help our customers achieve their goals and guide their businesses forward. Join us in our quest to change how people work with data and make a
   better world!

   Reporting to Senior Manager, Field Engineering.

   The impact you will have:
     * Form successful relationships with clients throughout your assigned territory, working with an account executive to provide technical and business value.
     * Gain excitement from clients about Databricks through hands-on evaluation and Spark programming, integrating with the wider cloud ecosystem and 3rd party applications.
     * Contribute to building the Databricks technical through engagement at workshops, seminars, and meet-ups.
     * Become a Big Data Analytics advisor on aspects of architecture and design.
     * Support your customers by authoring reference architectures, how-tos, and demo applications.
     * Develop both technically and in the pre-sales aspect with the goal of becoming an independently operating Solutions Engineer.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on a Solutions Engineer role, emphasizing customer relationships, technical advisement on architecture and design, and demonstrating a platform's value. While it mentions 'data science' and 'analytics', it lacks specific details about building, training, or deploying AI/ML models, fine-tuning LLMs, or developing generative AI applications. The core responsibilities lean towards pre-sales technical support and customer engagement rather than hands-on AI/ML engineering or development. Therefore, it does not fit the criteria for ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer and is best classified as Ambiguous.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves understanding customer challenges and aligning the Databricks platform to solve them, demonstrating business value, and guiding businesses forward.
job_tasks.phrase: demonstrate how our Databricks Data Intelligence Platform can help customers solve their complex data challenges

job_tasks.justification: The role requires forming relationships with clients and working with account executives to provide technical and business value.
job_tasks.phrase: Form successful relationships with clients throughout your assigned territory, working with an account executive to provide technical and business value.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves advising customers on architecture and design aspects of Big Data Analytics.
job_tasks.phrase: Become a Big Data Analytics advisor on aspects of architecture and design.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves hands-on evaluation and Spark programming, integrating with the cloud ecosystem and third-party applications, which implies some level of software integration and development for demonstration purposes.
job_tasks.phrase: Gain excitement from clients about Databricks through hands-on evaluation and Spark programming, integrating with the wider cloud ecosystem and 3rd party applications.

job_tasks.justification: The role requires authoring reference architectures, how-tos, and demo applications, which involves creating technical documentation and examples.
job_tasks.phrase: Support your customers by authoring reference architectures, how-tos, and demo applications.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves becoming an independently operating Solutions Engineer, which implies understanding the operational aspects of deploying and supporting solutions, though not explicitly MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop both technically and in the pre-sales aspect with the goal of becoming an independently operating Solutions Engineer.
